REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0143 reute d f BC-GULF-APPLIED-TECHNOLO 02-26 0049

TEXT.TITLE: GULF APPLIED TECHNOLOGIES <GATS> SELLS UNITS
TEXT.BODY: Gulf Applied Technologies Inc said it sold its subsidiaries engaged in pipeline and terminal operations for 12.2 mln dlrs. The company said the sale is subject to certain post closing adjustments, which it did not explain. Reuter
